qDefaultValidationMessages.MinLength: The value of "${field.templateOptions.label}" should have at least ${field.templateOptions.minLength} characters.
qDefaultValidationMessages.MaxLength: The value of "${field.templateOptions.label}" should be less than ${field.templateOptions.maxLength} characters.
qDefaultValidationMessages.Step: The value of "${field.templateOptions.label}" must be a multiple of ${field.templateOptions.step}.
qDefaultValidationMessages.MinCount: The number of values for "${field.templateOptions.label}" should not be less than ${field.templateOptions.min}.
qDefaultValidationMessages.MaxCount: The number of values for "${field.templateOptions.label}" should not be greater than ${field.templateOptions.max}.

GroupName.qDescription:
##Basic Information

Now we will go through information that we need from you for your life insurance application. It should take just about 10-15 minutes to complete. If at any time if you wish to save your progress so you can come back at a later time, simply click save for later above.

qHelpDialog.qHelpText: If you are currently pregnant, please use your pre-pregnancy weight.

qAllowedAnswers.value: United States of America and Other Territories (USA)
United States of America and Other Territories (USA)

condition.testValue: United States of America and Other Territories (USA)

qUSCitizen.qLabel: Are you a United States citizen?

qGreenCard.qLabel: Do you have Permanent Resident (Green Card) status?

qHelpDialog.qHelpText: We use this information to confirm your identity. It may also be used if we need to order a record of your driving history to evaluate your application.
qHelpDialog.qTitle: Why do you need my Driver License?

qNoDL.qLabel: I don't have a current Driver License

qHelpDialog.qHelpText: You do not need a current, active license to continue the application. Your license status doesn't make you ineligible to apply.
qHelpDialog.qTitle: Do I need a current, active license to apply?

qAllowedAnswers.value: I do not have a Driver License due to a medical condition
I have never had a Driver License
I did not renew my Driver License

condition.testValue: I did not renew my Driver License

qMZipcode.qPresentationClasses: ui-md-offset-1 ui-lg-offset-1 ui-g-2 ui-lg-2 ui-md-2 ui-sm-12

qValidations.validationMessage: Please enter a valid email address.

qPastDeclinesPostpones.qLabel: Have you ever had an application or reinstatement request for life, health or disability insurance declined or postponed?

qHelpDialog.qHelpText: Postponed means that during an insurance application process, you were advised coverage was not available for you at that time but you may re-apply in the future.

qPreExistingPolicy.qLabel: Do you have any existing life insurance or annuity contracts in force with this company or any other company?

qHelpDialog.qHelpText: "In force" means you have an active life insurance policy or annuity contract with any company. This does not include any group insurance you may have through an employer or member organization.

qReplaceContract.qLabel: Will the policy that you are applying for replace, terminate, or change any life insurance policies or annuity contracts you have?

qOccupationMilitary1.qLabel: Are you involved in any of the following military special forces?

qAllowedAnswers.value: U. S. Army Special Forces (a.k.a. The Green Berets)
Navy SEALs or Navy Special Warfare Development Group

qOccupationMilitary2.qLabel: Are you currently deployed or have you been notified of deployment in Afghanistan or Iraq?

qOccupationUnemployed.qLabel: Is this a temporary layoff or seasonal unemployment of 6 months or less?

qOccupationStayAtHome.qLabel: Is there a wage earner in your household?

GroupLabel.qDescription: #We will now move on to some questions about your personal history.

GroupHonestyStatement.qDescription: ##Honesty Statement 1I declare that all of the statements and answers I provide in this application are true and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief.

GroupProposedInsuredDeclaration.qDescription:
##Honesty Statement 2
I declare that I am the proposed insured that is applying for this life insurance policy.

qMedicalFacility.qLabel: Are you currently hospitalized, in a nursing facility, confined to a bed, or receiving hospice care?

qTerminalIllness.qLabel: Have you been diagnosed by a member of the medical profession as having a terminal condition (terminal condition means a medical condition resulting from injury or illness that is reasonably expected to result in the drastically limited life span of the Insured within 12 months or less)?

qHelpDialog.qHelpText: By member of the medical profession, we mean any person you are seeing for healthcare or medical advice.
qHelpDialog.qTitle: What do you mean by "qualified member of the medical profession"?

qCOVID.qLabel: In the past 5 years, have you tested positive for COVID-19 or self-isolated based on advice of a medical professional?

qCOVID30days.qLabel: Has it been at least 30 days since you completed self-isolation and are considered fully recovered?

qCOVIDawaitingresult.qLabel: Are you awaiting results of a test for COVID-19?

qCOVIDhospitalization.qLabel: Were you hospitalized due to COVID-19?

qTobacco.qLabel: In the last 12 months, how often have you used tobacco or nicotine products including any electronic nicotine delivery systems such as e-cigarettes or vaping  (excluding celebratory cigar use less than 4 times a year)?

qAllowedAnswers.value: I have not used tobacco or nicotine products in the last 12 months
I have never used tobacco or nicotine products

qTobaccoType.qLabel: Please identify type of tobacco used:

condition.testValue: I have not used tobacco or nicotine products in the last 12 months
I have never used tobacco or nicotine products

qTobaccoCigarettes.qLabel: How many packs of cigarettes do you smoke per day?

qTobaccoCigar.qLabel: Advise number of cigars smoked per year:

qTobaccoPipe.qLabel: Advise number of pipes smoked per year:

qTobaccoHookahPipe.qLabel: How many time do you use the hookah pipe per month?

qOxygenUse.qLabel: Have you been prescribed oxygen by a medical professional ?

qSurgeryTests.qLabel: In the past 5 years, have you been advised by a medical professional to have a medical procedure including surgery, a diagnostic test, or medical treatment of any kind which has not been done or, if completed, the results are not yet known, (other than for routine screening purposes or screening related to HIV/AIDS)?

qADL.qLabel: Do you require assistance with any of the following activities of daily living:  walking, bathing, dressing, eating, toileting, getting in and out of a chair or bed, or control of bowel or bladder problems?

Label21.qLabel: At any time, have you been diagnosed, treated, or had surgery by a medical professional for any of the following:
Label21.qDescription: At any time, have you been diagnosed, treated, or had surgery by a medical professional for any of the following:

qOrganTransplant.qLabel: Any condition requiring bone marrow, stem cell or organ transplant?

qAlzheimerS.qLabel: Alzheimer's disease, dementia, or mental incapacity?

qHIVAIDS.qLabel: Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV), Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (AIDS), or AIDS Related Complex (ARC)?

qHelpDialog.qHelpText: It's used as part of the application process to customize your policy.  What if I am unsure of my medical condition?  Please answer to the best of your ability. If more information is needed, a representative from our company may reach out to you to discuss additional details.
qHelpDialog.qTitle: Why do you need my health information?

qHIVAIDSFL.qLabel: Have you tested positive for exposure to the HIV infection or been diagnosed by a member of the medical profession as having ARC or AIDS caused by the HIV infection or other sickness or condition derived from such infection?

qHelpDialog.qHelpText: It's used as part of the application process to customize your policy.  What if I am unsure of my medical condition?  Please answer to the best of your ability. If more information is needed, a representative from our company may reach out to you to discuss additional details.
qHelpDialog.qTitle: Why do you need my health information?

qHIVAIDSCA.qLabel: Have you ever been diagnosed by a member of the medical profession with Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (AIDS) or AIDS Related Complex (ARC)?

qHelpDialog.qHelpText: It's used as part of the application process to customize your policy.  What if I am unsure of my medical condition?  Please answer to the best of your ability. If more information is needed, a representative from our company may reach out to you to discuss additional details.
qHelpDialog.qTitle: Why do you need my health information?

Label22.qLabel: Are you currently receiving treatment or been prescribed medication by a medical professional for diabetes that:
Label22.qDescription: Are you currently receiving treatment or been prescribed medication by a medical professional for diabetes that:

qDiabetesBefore40.qLabel: Was diagnosed by a medical professional before age 40?

qHeartAndDiabetes.qLabel: Is combined with any heart or circulatory disorder (other than high blood pressure) diagnosed by a medical professional?

qInsulinDosage.qLabel: Requires 40 or more units of insulin daily?

Label23.qLabel: Within the past 12 months, have you been diagnosed, treated, or had surgery by a medical professional for any of the following:
Label23.qDescription: Within the past 12 months, have you been diagnosed, treated, or had surgery by a medical professional for any of the following:

qHeartDisease.qLabel: Heart attack, heart valve disorder, heart blockage, stroke, or Transient Ischemic Attack (TIA/mini stroke)?

qLungDisease.qLabel: Lung disease (except controlled, mild asthma not requiring any hospitalization in the past 12 months)?

qCancer.qLabel: Any cancer (other than non-metastatic basal cell carcinoma or squamous cell carcinoma), or systemic lupus?

qLiverDisease.qLabel: Chronic pancreatitis, chronic hepatitis, or cirrhosis?

Label31.qLabel: At any time, have you been diagnosed, treated, or had surgery by a medical professional for any of the following:
Label31.qDescription: At any time, have you been diagnosed, treated, or had surgery by a medical professional for any of the following:

qParalysis.qLabel: Any permanent paralysis or amputation caused by a disease?

qWheelchair.qLabel: Are you currently dependent on a wheelchair or motorized mobility device?

Label32.qLabel: Within the past 24 months, have you been diagnosed, treated, or had surgery by a medical professional for any of the following:
Label32.qDescription: Within the past 24 months, have you been diagnosed, treated, or had surgery by a medical professional for any of the following:

qCirculatoryDisease.qLabel: Aneurysm, heart attack, any circulatory disorder (other than high blood pressure), stroke or Transient Ischemic Attack (TIA/mini stroke)?

qCancer24Months.qLabel: Any cancer (other than non-metastatic basal cell carcinoma or squamous cell carcinoma)?

qNeuromuscularDisorder.qLabel: Neuromuscular disorder including, but not limited to, cerebral palsy, multiple sclerosis, muscular dystrophy?

qConnectiveTissueDisorder.qLabel: Any connective tissue disorder, ulcerative colitis, or Crohn's disease?

qPsychiatricCondition.qLabel: Any psychiatric condition requiring inpatient treatment?

Label33.qLabel: Within the past 24 months, have you:
Label33.qDescription: Within the past 24 months, have you:

qMovingViolations.qLabel: Plead guilty to or been convicted of more than 4 moving violations?

qDUI.qLabel: Plead guilty to or been convicted of driving under the influence more than once?

qSubstanceAbuse.qLabel: Received or been advised by a medical professional to seek medical treatment or counseling to reduce consumption  or been prescribed medication for alcohol or substance abuse?

qPendingCharge.qLabel: Plead guilty to or been convicted of a felony or have any currently pending charges?

qHelpDialog.qHelpText: Having a criminal record does not necessarily impact your eligibility. Each case is individually reviewed.
qHelpDialog.qTitle: Will a criminal record impact my chances of getting approved for life insurance?
